QuestData.Title: Undying Twilight
QuestData.Description: The Twilight Cultists are here! They're trying to stop the ritual! Get to the back chambers and help fight them off!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Twilight invaders and 1 Desecrated Earthrager.
QuestData.CompletionText: We cannot let the binding be interrupted. They need your help in the back rooms - please hurry.
QuestData.RewardText: The Twilight forces continue to stream in, but it looks like the Earthen Ring defenders can handle them.
